meanings.definition: A type of marine animal related to the starfish.
meanings.sent1: The encrinites swayed gently in the ocean currents.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study encrinites to learn about ancient marine life.
meanings.sent3: The encrinites threw a party under the sea, inviting all their starfish cousins.
meanings.sent4: The encrinites in the fossil record are like time capsules from the past.
meanings.sent5: Children love to imagine swimming with encrinites in the prehistoric ocean.

meanings.definition: Fossilized remains of encrinites found in limestone.
meanings.sent1: The museum displayed a beautiful encrinites fossil for visitors to admire.
meanings.sent2: Paleontologists carefully excavated the encrinites fossils from the limestone rock.
meanings.sent3: The encrinites fossils in the limestone seemed to be playing hide and seek with the researchers.
meanings.sent4: The encrinites fossils embedded in limestone tell stories of ancient underwater worlds.
meanings.sent5: The encrinites fossils gleamed like hidden treasures waiting to be discovered.

meanings.definition: Encrinites were abundant in ancient seas.
meanings.sent1: Ancient sailors often spotted encrinites floating near the surface of the sea.
meanings.sent2: Encrinites thrived in the warm waters of the ancient oceans.
meanings.sent3: The encrinites in ancient seas were the celebrities of the underwater world.
meanings.sent4: The abundance of encrinites in ancient seas painted a picture of a bustling marine ecosystem.
meanings.sent5: The ancient seas echoed with the gentle movements of encrinites.
